summary: Diff implements an AI phase state machine for WhiteLatexBeast with a new ambush phase, adds enemy constants for ambush duration and escape distance, and updates chase behavior to track the player continuously and terminate on escape distance. Also includes unrelated project metadata/summary file updates not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project metadata tracking for the feature request (project_state.json)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for gameplay/AI changes and constants; it did not request maintaining a separate project state tracking file.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated a generated/aggregate frontend file summary listing many components unrelated to the requested enemy AI change
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention modifying documentation/summary artifacts; only specifies enemy AI/constants behavior changes and constraints.
